cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on October 21, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5497, Burma Unified through Rigorous Military Accountability Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 175 (Tuesday, October 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MEEKS:
H.R. 5497.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution.
[Page H5601]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: BURMA Act of 2021
